description: Try our easy to follow Kabana, Capsicum And Mushroom Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Kabana, Capsicum And Mushroom Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 small green capsicum, deseeded, sliced into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230Â°C. Line 2 oven trays with baking paper.
Place pizza bases on trays and spread both the tops with the pizza sauce. Scatter 1/4 cup cheese over each base.
Top pizzas with sliced kabana, capsicum and mushrooms. Scatter with remaining cheese.
Cook pizzas for 10-12 minutes or until cheese is golden and bubbling.
